name: 2048 (itch) (ImMoRTaL(Cool_Guy))
description:
This is a classical 2048 game your target is to create the largest number possible that is 2048. I hope you will all will like the game and also give a nice review. 

Rules of the game in case you didn't knew :-

The game concept is simple and complex at the same time. To only rule of the game is that you have to merge 2 tiles with the same numerical value and then they become 1 tile with x2 of their original value then you have to merge this new x2 tile with another x2 tile until you reach 2048.

HOW TO PLAY :-

You can easily play this game just press all the arrow keys and you will understand it.
